Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Varv peptide F (Varv F; Plant defensin)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Human tumor cell lines:RPMI-8226/s (IC50=5.90 µM), RPMI-8226/Dox40 (IC50=3.14 µM), RPMI-8226/LR-5 (IC50=6.31 µM), U-937GTB (IC50=7.07 µM), U-937Vcr (IC50=7.45 µM), ACHN (IC50=2.63 µM), CCRF-CEM (IC50=7.13 µM), CCRF-CEM/VM-1 (IC50=7.15 µM), NCI-H69 (IC50=7.49 µM), NCI-H69AR (IC50=7.12 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.20580652] HD50=33.04µM against human type O red blood cells.
Sequence Information.Function: Probably participates in a plant defense mechanism. Has cytotoxic activity against a variety of drug-resistant and drug-sensitive human tumor cell lines.
